title: Steel
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|It deals increased damage compared to normal ammo.}}

'''Steel''' is an throwing weapon [[brand]] that can found on [[tomahawk]]s and [[javelin]]s. Ammo with this brand deals 30% more damage.

Although it lacks any special abilities, steel ammo is a good choice for general use. However, it is less effective than [[silver]] when attacking vulnerable enemies. It is a rare find outside of [[god]] gifts and certain high-level monsters.

Note that while steel is a material in real life, in ''Crawl'', it and [[silver]] are implemented as brands, so you can't have a [[poisoned]] steel javelin or a silver [[exploding]] tomahawk.

==History==
*In [[0.24]], steel was merged with the [[silver]] brand.
*Prior to [[0.18]], this brand could be found on [[sling bullet]]s and [[bolt]]s.
*Prior to [[0.16]], steel ammunition would [[mulch]] 10% as often as normal.
*Prior to [[0.15]], steel ammunition weighed 300% as much as normal.
*Prior to [[0.9.0]], steel ammunition dealt 50% more damage.
*The steel brand was added in [[0.6.0]].
